    GenerateLogging(LogLevel, string, bool, string)

    Create formatted logging to be used with automation.

    Declaration
    public abstract string GenerateLogging(LogLevel level, string message, bool isFormattedMessage = false, string exceptionName = null)
    Parameters
    Type Name Description
    LogLevel level

    The logging level for the logger Name.
    string message

    the target message for logging.
    bool isFormattedMessage

    optional parameter that determines if the string uses a $ formatted string for the message with double quotes in the formatted output.
    string exceptionName

    Optional parameter to pass the exception field name to be included with the logging.
    Returns
    Type Description
    string

    The formatted logging Name to be Generated. If no message is provided will return null.
